de.tud.plt.r43ples.management

Class TripleStoreInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.management.TripleStoreInterface

  • public class TripleStoreInterface
extends Object
    Provides a interface to the triple store with URI and port specified via init method.
    Author:
    Stephan Hensel, Markus Graube

      • init

        public static void init(String sparql_endpoint,
        String sparql_username,
        String sparql_password)
                 throws org.apache.http.HttpException,
                        IOException
        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        sparql_endpoint - URI of the endpoint which used be used for further queries
        sparql_username - user name which should be used for authentication
        sparql_password - password which should be used for authentication
        Throws:
        IOException
        AuthenticationException
        org.apache.http.HttpException

        Executes a SPARQL query against the triple store without authorization.

        query - the SPARQL query
        format - the format of the result (e.g. HTML, xml/rdf, JSON, ...)

      • executeQueryWithAuthorization

        public static String executeQueryWithAuthorization(String query,
                                   String format)
                                            throws IOException,
                                                   org.apache.http.HttpException
        Executes a SPARQL-query against the triple store with authorization. (Based on the source code of the IAF device explorer - created by Sebastian Heinze.)
        Parameters:
        query - the SPARQL query
        format - the format of the result (e.g. HTML, xml/rdf, JSON, ...)
        Returns:
        the result of the query in the specified format
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.http.HttpException

        format - the format of the result (e.g. HTML, xml/rdf, JSON, ...)
